programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC está buscando a un sospechoso que está desfigurando víctimas a propósito. Además, Rossi tiene un encuentro incómodo con su exesposa, Hayden Montgomery, quien mantuvo a su hija, Joy, en secreto durante casi 30 años.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando los guardias de la prisión en Virginia interceptan un paquete de pruebas relacionadas con el secuestro de dos niños hace varios años, la UAC interroga a un famoso asesino serial que puede tener información sobre el paradero de los niños.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC se sorprende cuando Hotch es arrestado por un equipo SWAT y por sospecha de conspiración, mientras el equipo se apresura a demostrar su inocencia, sospechan que se avecina un complot mayor.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Verdad o consecuencias
programme.desc: Mientras comienza la búsqueda del sustituto de Ziva, Gibbs y los miembros restantes de su equipo deben volver al trabajo con el pasado todavía pesando en sus mentes.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Reunión
programme.desc: El equipo descubre que la extraña muerte de un marine y sus dos amigos puede estar relacionada con su pasado, pero es Gibbs quien acaba haciendo un viaje al pasado.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Informante
programme.desc: El equipo debe investigar de nuevo la muerte de un teniente después de que el bloguero que les acusó de encubrimiento aparezca muerto.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Policía bueno, policía malo
programme.desc: Cuando el cadáver de un marine aparece al otro lado del mundo, la investigación obliga a Ziva a desenterrar un capítulo enterrado de su vida.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): El precio de la justicia
programme.desc: Danny y Báez están decididos a conseguir justicia para una joven traumatizada que fue rehén, a pesar de su resistencia a presentar cargos.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Las regals de la mafia
programme.desc: Decididos a hacer justicia por el ataque a Gormley, Danny y Frank buscan la ayuda del detective Anthony Abetemarco, quien tiene vínculos con el barrio donde ocurrió el ataque.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Buen policía, mal policía
programme.desc: Danny y Baez investigan el asesinato de una anciana por una bala perdida. Mientras, Frank es ridiculizado por disciplinar a un policía irrespetuoso y Erin ayuda a su detective Anthony.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Por la comunidad
programme.desc: Erin y Anthony intentan evitar la deportación de la activista comunitaria Coryna Garza (Judy Reyes), quien no es ciudadana, y Frank debe decidir si el NYPD participará en la redada de alto perfil de los Marshals de EE. UU. contra una pandilla local.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando la ex miembro del equipo de la UAC y actual agente de la Interpol, Emily Prentiss localiza a un asesino en serie internacional, pide la ayuda de sus amigos de la UAC.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC está buscando a un sospechoso que está desfigurando víctimas a propósito. Además, Rossi tiene un encuentro incómodo con su exesposa, Hayden Montgomery, quien mantuvo a su hija, Joy, en secreto durante casi 30 años.

programme.title: Trick My Truck
programme.desc: Armando desperately wants something dependable and the Chrome Shop Mafia is set to give him a lot more than that. Watch as they gut his old truck and turn it into a low rider.

programme.title: Trick My Truck
programme.desc: Don't miss out as the boys set out to turn Dale's beater into a road hog monster. Tribal paint patterns and 3000 watts of audio power will make this truck the best ride on the road

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: As 51 rookies and veterans arrive to chase their dreams, the candidates hope to prove their talent with a standout solo performance and take on the kick line in the Judges' Showcase.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Melissa Rycroft comes to the first rehearsal to see which newbies have showmanship, DCC alum Natalie Woods hosts a rookie at her home, and Kelli and Judy make the first cuts of the season.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The 47 hopefuls learn the mechanics of the kickline, a rookie's injuries put her out of commission, and choreographer Evan Miller teaches a dance routine that calls for power and precision.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: With nine cuts looming before the team's first game, the hopefuls show off their freestyle dancing, get fit for their official uniforms and learn new choreography from Denise Dicharry.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Choreographer Criscilla Anderson uses her cancer battle to inspire the dancers, veteran mentors offer style tips to the rookies, and Travis Wall helps Judy and Kelli make their next cut.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The hopefuls practice the highly precise entrance routine and jump kicks for the first time, Jordann shares a vulnerable personal story, and Judy and Kelli make two more tough cuts.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: As the remaining ladies try out for the media-savvy Show Group, Judy and Kelli are faced with yet another difficult decision, and some dancers rise to glory while others' hearts are broken.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Makeovers give the dancers renewed confidence, alum Yuko shares exciting personal news, veteran Lisa makes a hard decision, and Kelli questions Alora-Rose about a rumored distraction.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Week nine of training camp intensifies when Kelli and Judy confront Alora-Rose and deliberate squad dismissal decisions one week before the first game of the season.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Kelli and Judy slyly make the final squad announcement, and the new team faces several obstacles before taking the field for their first game as Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders.

programme.title: Music City
programme.desc: Rachyl puts her dreams of becoming a lawyer on hold to support her husband, Kerry, in chasing after his goal of being a country musician in Nashville.

programme.title: Music City
programme.desc: When Kerry becomes unresponsive during his tour, the reality of his absence makes Rachyl question their future. Meanwhile, Jackson is ready to get closer to Jessica, but a surprise revelation may stand in the way of them getting more serious.

programme.title: Music City
programme.desc: The road calls and Kerry considers taking a gig on a tour that conflicts with his wedding anniversary. When Rachyl informs Kerry that she is seriously considering law schools in other states, Kerry puts his foot down.

programme.title: Music City
programme.desc: Jackson tries to take things slow with Jessica until unexpected temptations drive him back to his old ways. When Rachyl receives a text from an ex, her past threatens to derail her present. Alexandra competes in the Miss Tennessee USA Pageant.

programme.title: Music City
programme.desc: Jackson has to decide if he's ready for a serious relationship with Jessica, or if pageant girl Savana is more his speed. Rachyl struggles to tell Kerry about a recent text exchange with an Ex who just moved back to Nashville.

programme.title: The Wonder List
programme.desc: Aired 10/21/2017. As sea levels rise, the sunken city of Heracleion sounds a stark warning of the growing threat faced by the planet’s teeming coastal cities.

programme.title: The Wonder List
programme.desc: Aired 10/28/2017. Miners want to drill for billions of dollars worth of copper and gold beneath the pristine wilderness of America’s last wild frontier but fishermen say the world’s last great salmon run could be jeopardized.

programme.title: The Wonder List
programme.desc: Aired 11/04/2017. Conservationists turn killers in this battle to turn back time by eradicating mammal invaders threatening the islands’ unique ecosystem.

programme.title: Declassified
programme.desc: Aired 8/14/2016. Homeland Security Investigations conducts an elaborate undercover sting operation to stop an illegal arms dealer.

programme.title: Declassified
programme.desc: Aired 8/21/2016. After the Taliban refused to release international aid workers being held hostage in Afghanistan, the CIA, Joint Special Operations Command, and a Taliban double agent race against time to rescue them.

programme.title: Declassified
programme.desc: Aired 8/28/2016. In 2004, the FBI and Naval Criminal Investigative Service needed to catch an engineer who had been stealing U.S. Navy secrets for the Chinese government.

programme.title: Declassified
programme.desc: Aired 9/04/2016. When classified footage from a top secret surveillance satellite was lost in the Pacific Ocean during the Cold War, the U.S. military engaged in a race against time to find and recover the footage before it fell into enemy hands.

programme.title: American Style
programme.desc: Aired 01/20/2019. As the millennium came to an end, women made strides in the workplace and in media. In the 2000s, the internet brought drastic changes to American life.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man in hiding is sniffed out quickly by the K-9 unit, a couple gets caught lying when an officer recognizes them, and a woman's dogs save her a trip to jail.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: During a traffic stop, a driver drops off his passenger before speeding away. Deputies are amazed when a man offers them an ID that looks nothing like him. Deputies investigate a case of road rage involving a gun.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A teenager who ran away from home tries running from the cops too. A man set a date to turn his life around, but deputies ask him to start earlier. A man found with hundreds of sunglasses claims he was going to give them away.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers pursue a male suspect in a speeding truck and ultimately force the vehicle off the road, the suspect is taken into custody without injury. Officers respond to a domestic abuse call. Officers are called to a home where a dead body is found.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Prostitute sting operations prove successful for undercover officers in both Wichita, KS and Palm Beach, FL. Officers inform an unsuspecting John that the individual offering up services is likely not who he thinks they are.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: The passenger of a fleeing driver makes his own getaway, a motorcyclist in a high-speed pursuit narrowly misses a car, and police respond to a disturbance call.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Torrential rain hampers the pursuit of a fleeing vehicle, a man on a moped is carrying more than he lets on, and a persistent police officer unravels a sketchy man's story.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man and woman are pulled over while out on a candy run. A simple traffic violation turns into a multi-vehicle police pursuit. Deputies are notified of a stolen car and find the driver in possession of an interesting tool.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: When the cuffs come out, an emotional cyclist gives deputies the runaround. A boyfriend’s honesty saves his girlfriend from going to jail on her birthday. Police investigate a case of road rage involving a possible gun.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A young couple spends too much time arguing and not enough time paying attention to the road. An officer uses his surefire trick to catch someone in a lie. A chatty driver racks up a slew of charges in front of his own house.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man leads Officers on a pursuit across county lines. An Officer assists in an undercover sting to capture drug dealers. An Officer finds a gun in a suspects car.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A white-knuckled police chase ends in a dramatic escape and an unsettling officer injury. An intoxicated prowler is reported after a woman spots him in a tree. Officers bring in the K-9 unit to sniff out a suspicious van.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Fleeing suspects risk their safety by hiding in a dangerous swamp. For one driver, a broken truck turns out to be the start of a very long list of problems. Deputies sympathize with a woman who’s been put through the wringer.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies gradually get to the bottom of a possible stolen vehicle. A woman asks the police to help her make a clean break from bad habits. A single woman tries to plan a date with an online suitor, but the night quickly goes awry.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies respond to an armed carjacking, an altercation leads to a woman's arrest, and officers face a combative man.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man throws out his narcotics during a foot chase with police. A woman is arrested for possession of drug paraphernalia. Officers call for backup after a woman is held at knife-point.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A sizable amount of cocaine is seized during a routine search. An officer responds to a domestic dispute call, in which there are conflicting stories at the scene. An officer’s patrol car is nearly struck by a train, twice.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A female assailant attacks a woman after merely bumping into her. A woman is arrested for spilling beer on an unsuspecting cameraman’s expensive equipment. Two intoxicated women are placed under arrest after a physical altercation.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Security guards face wild threats from a suspect who states he has a 'burner' gun. A man is bit on the head and nearly faints. A passenger throws out a suspicious bag during a traffic stop.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police find a burglary suspect up a tree in a California backyard, a parolee at large attempts to flee officers, and a man with a suspended license blows his second chance.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police investigate a possible abduction at a trailer park. A man in a stolen truck is pulled over and Officers discover washed checks and drug paraphernalia. A suspect is arrested after abandoning a stolen vehicle behind a fast food restaurant.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A first-time offender brings officers on an intense car chase, deputies respond to an armed robbery, and a routine traffic stop ends in multiple arrests.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man caught with a stolen moped attempts to run while handcuffed. Police find a man with his pants down behind a business. A suspect found asleep in his poorly parked car complains of sciatic pain.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: After crashing a car during a pursuit, the driver runs into a pho restaurant and is captured. A loitering suspect is spotted smoking a meth pipe. A drunk driver is pulled from a smoking wreck.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A stabbing victim has his throat slashed while waiting for his wife. A man is shocked to learn that his rental box truck was reported stolen. Spice is found in a nervous passenger's purse.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Narcotics officers end up in a foot chase during a buy-bust operation. Officers respond to a dispute with a tow truck driver at a strip club. The odor of marijuana on a traffic stop leads to a citation for the cooperative driver.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Two men acting strangely in a gas station draw the suspicion of an employee. Deputies arrest a man for creating an unsafe environment for his younger brother. Mom calls the cops when her daughter throws water on her.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The sheriff is under political pressure to find who killed an air marshal with a car bomb that the sheriff witnessed.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A teenager is found murdered on a construction site. Grissom, Sara, and Warrick follow the lead of blood on a hammer.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The lone holdout on a jury is found dead in the jury room. The eleven jurors who were voting guilty and who hated the dead juror are the natural suspects.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A woman found murdered in her home. Her resemblance to Sara causes Grissom to take a personal interest in the case and forces him to examine the decisions he has made in his life.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom, Sara, and Nick respond to an electrocution at a casino. The casino is hosting Japanese antiquities. The electrocution is just a ruse to steal the central piece of the exhibit.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A robbery at a grocery store results in a shootout leaving five dead. The police officer at the scene believes Grissom has a grudge against him.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The whole team must investigate a crime where a husband and his porn star wife were murdered execution-style.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Catherine and Sara deal with the death of what at first seems to be a transvestite.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A mutilated female body is discovered tied to the undercarriage of a bus carrying prisoners from a women's correctional facility after a severed arm flies out from beneath the vehicle and strikes a car.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A violent murder in a casino parking garage and another episode in the police interview room lead the CSIs to one shocking discovery after another.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Warrick, Catherine, and Nick try to determine the cause of a house fire that kills a teenage girl. The fire is in the same neighborhood as a similar arson fire. Grissom and Sara investigate a man found dead with letter tiles in his stomach.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom, Catherine, and Nick investigate the death of a runner during a competition. Meanwhile, Sara and Warrick investigate the death of a couple in a hotel room, initially thought to be a murder-suicide.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A roller coaster runs off its track, leaving six people dead. The CSI team investigates whether this was an accident or foul play.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Two young men are found murdered after scamming Sam Braun's casinos.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom, Sara y Nick responden a una electrocución en un casino. El casino alberga antigüedades japonesas. La electrocución no es más que una treta para robar la pieza central de la exposición.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Un robo en una tienda de comestibles acaba en un tiroteo que deja cinco muertos. El policía cree que Grissom le guarda rencor.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Todo el equipo debe investigar un crimen en el que un marido y su esposa, estrella del porno, fueron asesinados al estilo ejecución.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Catherine y Sara se enfrentan a la muerte de lo que al principio parece ser un travesti.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Un cuerpo femenino mutilado es descubierto atado a los bajos de un autobús que transporta presas de un correccional de mujeres, después de que un brazo amputado salga volando de debajo del vehículo y golpee un coche.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Un violento asesinato en el aparcamiento de un casino y otro episodio en la sala de interrogatorios de la policía llevan a los CSI a un sorprendente descubrimiento tras otro.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Warrick, Catherine y Nick intentan determinar la causa del incendio de una casa en el que muere una adolescente. El incendio se produce en el mismo barrio que otro incendio provocado similar.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom, Catherine y Nick investigan la muerte de un corredor durante una competición. Mientras tanto, Sara y Warrick investigan la muerte de una pareja en una habitación de hotel, que inicialmente se pensó que había sido un asesinato-suicidio.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Una montaña rusa se sale de la vía y deja seis muertos. El equipo de CSI investiga si se trata de un accidente o de juego sucio.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Dos jóvenes aparecen asesinados tras estafar a los casinos de Sam Braun.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Una empleada de un casino es golpeada y violada cuando vuelve a casa del trabajo, pero sobrevive e identifica a su agresor.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Una noche febril en Las Vegas se salda con un hombre muerto con un traje de alienígena, otro hombre muerto en una bañera, una mujer muerta con dos hombres sospechosos en la escena del crimen y otro hombre muerto con una polaroid de otro hombre muerto.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Las fuertes lluvias en Las Vegas arrastran un cadáver por las alcantarillas. Mientras el equipo investiga, encuentran huesos en el alcantarillado que solo podrían ser de un asesinato.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Una niña es secuestrada en el exterior de una tienda de comestibles, lo que desencadena una alerta Amber.

programme.desc: A band of masked gunmen invade an upscale spa, with the female customers' luxury cars as their booty. A customer is injured in the melee.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The bodies of two men, shot execution-style, are discovered in an abandoned hotel slated for demolition. Horatio and the CSI team investigate.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A cell phone call leads the team to investigate a kidnapping that, unless they reach the victim before it’s too late, could soon become a murder.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: While investigating the disappearance of a cruise ship passenger, the team discovers that a murder has also taken place on the ship.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The CSI Team is on high alert when the deadly Mala Noche gang initiates a shooting rampage during the trial of one of their members.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio’s search for Antonio Riaz continues. The Feds take over the lab and investigate each team member when $12,000 is missing from a drug bust.

programme.title: CSI: Miami

programme.title: CSI: Miami

programme.title: CSI: Miami

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team must investigate when Calleigh is run off the road into a canal, compromising crime scene evidence she just collected.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: After an entire neighborhood learns that they are being forced out of their homes, the local politician supporting eminent domain is murdered.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The CSIs must investigate a strange case involving voodoo and are spooked when bizarre accidents start happening around the lab.

programme.title: CSI: Miami

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando una familia entera desaparece sin dejar rastro, Horatio jura encontrarlos, vivos o muertos.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI expone la parte más sórdida de los concursos de belleza de niñas cuando la madre de una concursante es asesinada.

programme.desc: Asesinan a un genio excéntrico con el arma más singular que jamás haya visto el equipo de CSI.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando los miembros de una hermandad de mujeres de Miami son eliminados uno por uno, el equipo de CSI intenta poner fin a la ola de asesinatos.

programme.desc: Cuando un bienhechor del vecindario es asesinado, Horatio y el equipo de CSI descubren que él estaba planeando denunciar algo importante.

programme.desc: Cuando el Atormentador de Miami vuelve a matar, Horatio se encuentra cara a cara con la matriarca de la familia del presunto asesino, que puede o no ayudar en su investigación.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando casi matan a un amado entrenador de tenis, Calleigh descubre un vínculo personal con el caso.

programme.title: CSI: Miami

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando asesinan a uno de los mayores enemigos del equipo de CSI, Horatio debe determinar cuál de los miembros de su equipo es sospechoso.

programme.desc: Megan Donner regresa a la unidad de CSI a tiempo para trabajar en un accidente de avión en los Everglades. Descubren una víctima a ocho kilómetros del accidente.

programme.desc: Después de que los pescadores capturan a un tiburón tigre y descubren parte de un torso humano en su estómago, la evidencia lleva al equipo a sospechar de un asesinato.

programme.desc: The CSI New York team of investigators finds a body on a rooftop and must find the killer who is manipulating crime scenes.

programme.desc: The CSI New York team of investigators experience eerie occurrences after a woman is found who has literally been scared to death.

programme.desc: Cuando encuentran a un jugador de paintball muerto a tiros, Flack se da cuenta de que un policía corrupto que está bajo su supervisión podría ser el culpable.

programme.desc: Mac y Flack investigan la muerte de un profesional del paracaidismo cuyo paracaídas fue atacado con palomas muertas que lo hicieron caer al suelo.

programme.desc: Cuando un rico agente inmobiliario es encontrado muerto en una casa, Mac y Stella trabajan con pruebas que sugieren que él fue secuestrador o secuestrado.

programme.desc: Danny y Mac encuentran un cadáver en un camión de sal que luego identifican como un ejecutivo de deportes extremos de alto poder.

programme.desc: Un hombre murió en su casa después de una larga historia de enfermedad cardíaca. Se asumió que esta fue la causa de su muerte.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Dos sospechosos están vinculados a un asesinato por unas botas manchadas de sangre y una pistola, pero el dueño de los artículos dice que nunca conoció a la víctima.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Un vecino vio cómo un hombre apuñalaba a su esposa, la empujaba a la piscina y le metía la cabeza bajo el agua.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1971, John List dejó una nota con los cuerpos de su madre, esposa y tres hijos en el salón de baile de su mansión antes de desaparecer por completo. Los detectives deben resolver el caso, a pesar de tener solo una fotografía desactualizada de List.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1990, el cuerpo de Shirley Andronowich fue encontrado mutilado. Los testigos le dijeron a la policía que tuvo una pelea con su esposo la noche anterior, pero la evidencia forense demostró que él no tuvo nada que ver con su muerte.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Placas y mentiras
programme.desc: Un estudiante universitario fue encontrado muerto y la evidencia sugirió que conocía a su asesino.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Muere un atleta de secundaria, luego de que lo atropellaran y se dieran a la fuga. Todos en el pueblo lamentaron su muerte. Encontrar al asesino era muy poco probable.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 2006, la agente de bienes raíces de Texas Sarah Anne Walker fue brutalmente asesinada en una casa modelo. Semanas después, se presentó un testigo que pudo haber visto al asesino.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1998, una actuación de asesinato misterioso en Maryland se convierte en una verdadera novela policíaca cuando se descubre el cuerpo gravemente quemado de Stephen Hricko en su habitación de hotel.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Manchas delatoras
programme.desc: La policía instituyó una búsqueda intensa cuando la madre de dos niños pequeños desapareció.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En este episodio clásico de Archivos Forenses la serie de crímenes reales más extensa de la historia de la televisión, Eileen y Derrick Severs desaparecen de su casa en un pequeño pueblo de Gran Bretaña y la policía encuentra evidencia de un crimen.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1994, Shannon Melendi, de 19 años, desapareció mientras estaba en la Universidad de Emory. Su desaparición permaneció un misterio durante diez años, hasta que una nueva prueba científica proporcionó una nueva pista sobre Colvin "Butch" Hinton.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1999, Valiree Jackson, de 9 años, desapareció camino a la escuela cerca de Spokane. Su padre, Brad Jackson, denunció la desaparición y toda la comunidad comenzó a buscar a su secuestrador.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Los síntomas parecidos a los de la gripe de una madre y sus hijos resultan ser algo más grave: intoxicación por talio. Después de la muerte de la madre, los investigadores centran su atención en encontrar al asesino.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Edward Honaker fue declarado culpable de violación, sodomía y agresión sexual agraviada y condenado a tres cadenas perpetuas en prisión. El sostuvo su inocencia.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Los investigadores examinan las cenizas de un incendio que mató a una mujer de 40 años. El fuego parecía haber sido iniciado por un cigarrillo desatendido.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando una mujer desaparecía sin dejar rastro, había dos posibles explicaciones: secuestro o asesinato.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Se encontró a Janice Johnson muerta al pie de las escaleras del sótano. La policía de Nueva Escocia tuvo que desenredar las circunstancias que rodearon la muerte de Janice y responder a la pregunta: ¿Fue un accidente o un asesinato?

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1999, Susan Fassett fue abatida a tiros cuando salía de su práctica de coro de la iglesia en Poughkeepsie, Nueva York. Su esposo Jeff se convirtió en el principal sospechoso, hasta que fue absuelto por la policía.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: El cuerpo de Leanne Tiernan, de 16 años, fue descubierto nueve meses después de su desaparición. Los científicos forenses encontraron pistas que pintaron un retrato virtual de su asesino.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: La coartada
programme.desc: En 1991, una chica de secundaria desaparece después de asistir a una fiesta. El principal sospechoso no tenía a un pero dos testigos que le daban coartada para la noche en que desapareció.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En la búsqueda del asesino de dos adolescentes de Texas, un perfil de conducta llevó a sospechar de Jason Massey. La ciencia demostró que el perfil era correcto y Massey fue ejecutado mediante inyección letal el 3 de Abril del 2001.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 2008, la universitaria Jenna Verhaalen fue encontrada muerta en su departamento de Bryan, Texas y las hemorragias petequiales en sus ojos indicaron que fue estrangulada.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Cabecera
programme.desc: Cuando los cazadores encontraron un cráneo en un cañón de Texas, la policía encontró trozos de ropa, huesos pequeños y un mechón de cabello.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Falso testimonio
programme.desc: La muerte de una mujer en Pensilvania desencadena una investigación por homicidio sobre la muerte de otra mujer en Carolina del Norte.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En una tarde cálida del verano, en el pueblo de Verona, Wisconsin, se enfrentaba a su primer triple homicidio. Para resolver este caso, los investigadores tuvieron que adentrarse en el mundo de jugadores de alto nivel y apuestas fuera del país.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: ¿Quién fue el delincuente sexual que asesinó a dos muchachos adolescentes en Nebraska? La clave para detenerlo sería la composición única de la cuerda basura que usó para amarrar a sus víctimas.

programme.desc: Flav splits his ladies up into two teams for the first ever Flavorette Roast Challenge. Each team picks one girl from the other team to put in the hot seat, and they cut loose with a full on verbal beatdown.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: With 26 sealed briefcases full of varying amounts of cash, ranging from a penny to $1m – contestants decide whether to accept an offer of cash from ‘the Banker,’ in exchange for what might be contained in the contestant’s chosen briefcase.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: The contestant picks one case which is theirs to keep. As each of the 25 cases is opened, the likelihood of the player having a valuable cash amount in their case decreases or increases, with ‘the Banker’ tempting the player throughout the game.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: The Motor City brings John West, father of five sons, to the stage. The retired automotive line worker wants to retire in comfort and provide an even better future for his sons.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Amidst the crowded classrooms and the battle for school territory, tensions between Lakehurst and Degrassi students continue to mount. But Spinner’s got his eye on enemy territory -- the adorably tough new Lakehurst girl, Jane.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Faced with his own aggression and looming mortality, Spinner attempts to prove his ‘masculinity’ by kicking an unnecessary amount of Lakehurst ass.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Manny’s moved back home but the honeymoon between she and her parents is just about over. And when her dad insists she have a traditional “Debut” – the lavish party many Filipino girls have for their 18th birthday – Manny takes a stand.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ellie’s ex-mentor Caitlin Ryan arrives to do a guest lecture series in Jesse’s class and Ellie sees her opportunity to set herself apart from her peers. She throws herself into Caitlin’s class assignment and her hard work quickly pays off.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Emma decides she’ll do what it takes to get back on track, starting by rekindling her friendship with Manny, but when Manny wants to hit an audition to be a ‘Purple Dragon’ sports drink model, Emma finds herself quickly at odds with her best friend.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Spinner deals with chemo, timing how long he can go between barf-buckets, while his cheerleader Jane, tries to bring the party to him.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Marco and Ellie’s retail therapy goes awry when Marco finds his credit card maxed out. Ellie rescues him this time, but Marco realizes a new job is the real solution—and might even give him the opportunity to meet new people.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Roofie rape victim Darcy is barreling down a self-destructive path and only a handful of people know why.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Manny and Jay’s faux-mance is working perfectly. But when Jay gets too serious, Manny reminds him it's all fake.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After Manny discovers that her University demo reel is actually a sex tape that she and Jay made, her future hangs in the balance. By the time Jay catches up to her with the correct DVD, it's too late.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When cute and funny Rachel joins Peter, Danny & Derek’s MI group for their “How-To” video project, confidence is high.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Mia’s finally been granted a spot on Spirit Squad, and she’s ecstatic. But trying to be a normal teenager is proving a difficult balancing act.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Paige is on her A game - she's excelling at work, Andrea's given her a raise, and she’s going to use the money to redesign her bedroom.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Since Snake’s suspension from teaching, Emma’s life has been turned upside-down. He’s really in a funk, and the dark cloud over his head has fouled the air at home, where Emma finds herself caught in the no-man’s-land between her parents.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jimmy finally gets the news he’s been waiting for – he’s been accepted into NYU! But he’s got other things on his mind. He is slowly discovering that he has other options when it comes to his real dream – walking again.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It’s Anya’s first year running the Free The Children Freedom Fast to promote education and health in Africa. She has a lot to coordinate - which would be hard enough without meddling Holly J, who’s determined to make Anya choose between her and Sav.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Mia’s renewed relationship with Lucas is making her feel like she’s on top of the world. With the extra free time afforded by his help, she's taking on all the high school things her parenting has kept her from enjoying.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Marco’s world is rocked when Paige drops a bomb – her dad’s going to help her buy a condo. Ellie’s just learned she might be up for the editorship of the Core newspaper, so she’s distracted.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Spinner and Jimmy have just one more exam before they’re finally done school and, with Jimmy's help, Spinner's sure he can pass and enjoy his cancer-free future.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: With time ticking towards the Class of ’07 Prom and Graduation ceremony, Liberty has the perfect night planned: a hotel prom, with the amazing Natasha Bedingfield performing.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Relieved of parental duty for the year by mom, Mia starts the school year off with a bang by bonding with new girl, Leia, and getting scouted to be the new face of football star Tom Blakes’ shoe line.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Mia does what she can to ensure her success. Besides, Tom is handsome and famous, so Mia thinks being with Tom to get ahead isn’t such a bad trade.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jane wants to play football but since there is no girls team, then boys’ football it is. The Shep doesn’t like the idea one bit, but once Jane proves she’s faster, stronger, and more athletic than most of the team, he relents…

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Eager to make the most of her college experience, Liberty jumps at the chance to rush the most popular sorority at Smithdale. Determined to get in, Liberty slowly exchanges old habits and old friends (Manny and Emma) for sorority approved ones.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Peter begins a relationship with Mia and a friendship with Riley. Finding a balance between a new girlfriend and a new guy friend gets confusing, especially when Riley is suddenly kissing Peter.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Sav and Anya plan to celebrate their six-month anniversary on the school’s overnight trip. Only problem? Alli, Sav’s sister, convinces their parents to let her go on the trip on the condition that Sav spends every second with her.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Mia’s T-Bombz campaign is hitting the city and Degrassi. But Holly J has bigger and better things going on. She’s prepping the Power Squad for an out-of-town competition, and things are looking good.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Rick decides to get back at his bullies, hitting them right where it hurts – their cars. But when Jimmy becomes a member of the “Whack Your Brain” team, the two form a truce.

programme.title: Walking with Monsters: Life Before Dinosaurs
programme.desc: On the supercontinent Pangea, early therapsids, creatures more similar to mammals than reptiles, fight for survival alongside other animals. In the carboniferous swamps, insects and arthropods take over and grow into giants.

programme.title: Science of Walking With Beasts
programme.desc: This episode explains how the 120-million-year reign of the dinosaurs ended when mammals became the fastest and fiercest creatures on the planet.

programme.title: Science of Walking With Beasts
programme.desc: A look at the science that has proved Darwin's idea that intelligent, sophisticated humans have an ancestral connection with the ape.

programme.title: Lost Worlds: Vanished Lives
programme.desc: David travels the world to unravel some of the wonders and puzzles of palaeontology. But how do you find the world's oldest and rarest reptile?

programme.title: Lost Worlds: Vanished Lives
programme.desc: Could pterodactyls fly? And why did trilobites have such good eyes? David Attenborough investigates the secret lives of animals from the past, as told in the fossil record.

programme.title: Lost Worlds: Vanished Lives
programme.desc: David Attenborough uncovers dinosaur bones in the Sahara desert and visits the biggest, most spectacular dinosaur displays in the world.

programme.title: Lost Worlds: Vanished Lives
programme.desc: David Attenborough uncovers bizarre creatures of the earliest seas, tiny horses the size of spaniels and an animal that's half bird and half reptile - the rarest of them all.

programme.title: The Truth About Killer Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Bird expert Bill Oddie helps construct amazing, life-sized, bio-mechanical replicas as he presents an imaginary battle between a tyrannosaurus rex and a triceratops.

programme.title: The Truth About Killer Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Here, Bill Oddie asks whether the Velociraptor was really the monstrous predator of popular legend.

programme.title: The Mystery of the Body in the Bog
programme.desc: Veteran archaeologist Ned Kelly and a team of scientists investigate the find of a mummified body in the boglands of Cashel, Ireland.

programme.title: Monsters We Met
programme.desc: America was once home to such fierce predators as the giant short-faced bear and the saber-toothed tiger.

programme.title: Monsters We Met
programme.desc: In Australia 65,000 years ago, the first human explorers face a land populated with giant lizards, killer rhino-like creatures and deadly birds.

programme.title: Monsters We Met
programme.desc: The Maori struggled for survival 1,000 years ago in a New Zealand populated by giant birds.

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: For thousands of years, downtown LA hid an indiscriminate killer. In one of the most surprising wildlife crime stories in the world, `Natural World' turns forensic detective to solve the mystery and unmask victims and killers.

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: The world's biggest beasts have always captured the imagination, but whilst being big can have its advantages, it also comes with sizeable challenges. The Komodo dragon's huge appetite means it must take on prey ten times its weight.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games
programme.desc: The TARDIS arrives in no man’s land during World War I. Rescued from the Germans, the travellers are put on trial by the British General Smythe who is not all he seems.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games
programme.desc: Finding evidence of alien technology in Smythe’s office, the Doctor, Jamie, and Zoe make their escape in Lady Jennifer’s ambulance, but Smythe gives orders to have them killed.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games
programme.desc: The Doctor discovers that they are on an alien planet divided into different time zones where human soldiers fight never-ending wars.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games
programme.desc: The Doctor and Zoe penetrate the Aliens' HQ from where the war games are controlled. Carstairs is reconditioned and exposes the Doctor and Zoe as German spies.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games
programme.desc: In the American Civil War zone, Jamie and Lady Jennifer join forces with resistance fighters from various time zones and prepare to launch an attack on Central Control.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games
programme.desc: The Doctor sends Zoe to the war zones to assemble a resistance force. The Doctor remains in Central Control to steal the processing machine, but the War Chief is one step ahead.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games
programme.desc: The Doctor, Jamie, and Carstairs have escaped back to the 1917 war zone, but General Smythe is waiting for them and opens fire on them with a machine gun.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games
programme.desc: The Doctor is captured by the War Chief who belongs to the same race of people as the Doctor and offers an alliance. In the 1917 zone fighters prepare to attack Central Control.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games
programme.desc: The rebels seize control of the Aliens' HQ but the Doctor is forced to send a call for help to his own people, the Time Lords.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games
programme.desc: The war games are over and the Doctor is put on trial by the Time Lords for breaking the laws of time.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Spearhead from Space
programme.desc: The TARDIS takes the newly regenerated Doctor to Earth to begin his exile. Brigadier Lethbridge-Stewart leads a UNIT investigation into a mysterious meteorite shower.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Spearhead from Space
programme.desc: A recovered Doctor escapes the hospital and joins UNIT in their investigation. Meanwhile, Channing directs one of his Auton servants to recover a meteorite.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Spearhead from Space
programme.desc: Sam Seeley has found one of the meteorites but the Autons want it back and are closing in. General Scobie visits Auto Plastics, playing into the hands of Channing.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Spearhead from Space
programme.desc: The invasion begins as Auton shop dummies come to life and attack the public. The Doctor and UNIT infiltrate Auto Plastics where the Doctor faces the Nestene consciousness.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Inferno
programme.desc: UNIT is at a project run by Professor Stahlman who intends to penetrate Earth’s crust. But the drilling has already released something deadly from beneath the Earth’s surface.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Inferno
programme.desc: The green slime oozing from the drill head is transforming men into monsters. Stahlman refuses to listen to the warnings and resorts to sabotage so that his project may continue.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Inferno
programme.desc: Transported to a parallel world, the Doctor discovers that England is under military rule and the drilling project is at a more advanced stage.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Inferno
programme.desc: In the parallel world, the drilling project is about to penetrate the Earth’s crust. The Doctor, arrested as a spy, is unable to convince his captors of the danger that faces them.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Inferno
programme.desc: In the parallel world, Earth’s crust has been penetrated, releasing terrible forces from within the Earth. The Doctor must escape back to his world to prevent the same catastrophe.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Inferno
programme.desc: As the Earth in the parallel world faces destruction, the Doctor is desperate to return to his world to warn them of the danger. But time is running out.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Inferno
programme.desc: The Doctor has escaped the doomed, parallel Earth and has returned to his own world where he attempts to put a halt to the drilling project.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Terror of the Autons
programme.desc: The Master paves the way for an invasion by the insidious Nestene consciousness.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Terror of the Autons
programme.desc: The Master uses his hypnotic powers to take control of a factory where he creates Autons.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Terror of the Autons
programme.desc: The only clue to the Master's plans is a single plastic daffodil.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Terror of the Autons
programme.desc: The Master is broadcasting an activation signal to open a channel for the Nestenes.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Mind of Evil
programme.desc: The Doctor and Jo arrive at Stangmoor Prison for a demonstration of the Keller Machine, a device capable of extracting negative emotions from criminal minds.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Mind of Evil
programme.desc: A prison riot puts Jo in danger while the Doctor assists the Brigadier. Meanwhile, at the World Peace Conference, the Chinese delegate's aid prepares to kill the American delegate.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A woman's French bulldog exhibits people aggression that started for no apparent reason when he turned two years old.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Life coach and fitness trainer Jillian Michaels can whip contestants on the "Biggest Loser" television series into shape, but she's at a loss when it comes to her dog; escape artist dog; dog dislikes brooms and windshield wipers.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Two German shepherds who get along fine at home, but are at each other's throats when at daycare; a miniature schnauzer that barks when her owner's grandchildren visit.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A great Dane bites her owner; a bearded collie with dog aggression; a mouthy French mastiff.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Weimaraner is aggressive towards anyone who turns on one of the motorized bikes used to deliver the mail; an aggressive shar-pei; an Australian red cattle dog who barks incessantly.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Maltese hates being on his leash; an American Eskimo barks and circles strangers who enter the house; a Nova Scotia duck tolling retriever with a fear of pools.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps a pregnant Ashlee Simpson-Wentz's English bulldog with his aggression issues before the baby arrives; a retriever with food aggression.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An aggressive sheepdog/collie mix needs extra attention, so Cesar brings him to the Dog Psychology Center; a St. Bernard with a fear of stairs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Great Dane behaves aggressively toward strange dogs; a Lhasa apso eats everything she can get her paws on.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Chihuahua mix with aggression issues; a Pomeranian with severe separation anxiety; an Aussie/shar pei mix who runs away when his owner coughs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Two wolf hybrids with aggression issues; an aggressive Chihuahua.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A basset hound is afraid of her owner's husband; a blue heeler mix with unique bedtime rituals.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A vicious Chihuahua frightens the pit bulls at the rescue center where he lives.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Wheaten terrier puppy bites when playing; a Jack Russell terrier jumps when the garbage disposal runs and lunges at the dishwasher; a Lab fears shiny floors.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's latest fugitive doesn't think small when it comes to illegal drugs: he was carrying almost a pound of meth when he was arrested. Now he's on the run with his pregnant girlfriend on the high plains of Colorado.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is back in Hawaii and tracking a dangerous fugitive through the jungles of the Big Island. Their prey is being protected by a ring of family and friends that Dog must forcefully confront to bring in his man.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When Dog decides to spend the day caring for his newest granddaughter, Beth enlists the girls to hunt down a female fugitive. Heading into a dangerous part of town, the ladies will use their feminine wiles to track this mother gone wrong.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and his old friends, Tim Chapman and Sonny Westbrook are riding with the team, so their target, a thief with violent tendencies, is out of luck. When Dog learns that the fugitive is also a disrespectful son, he is more motivated to find his man.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog doesn't have the whole team today, and he's got to catch a fugitive with a record of criminal assault. But when Dog finds the fugitive's former girlfriend, she thinks he isn't dangerous at all.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: For months, this fugitive has been stringing Leland along with a series of barely believable excuses. Out of patience, Leland calls in the Big Dog. The team whole team heads out to put pressure on the family and friends of the fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's latest quarry is running from abuse and assault charges. As Dog investigates, he discovers that this fugitive has gamed the system by jumping from one bond, and one bondsman, to another.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When the co-signer of a bond is also romantically involved with the defendant, sometimes the bondman is put in the middle of a lover's quarrel.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is in Denver helping Bobby Brown to track down a fugitive with a long rap sheet. But, unfortunately, they have no picture of the felon to work with, so the challenges are big on this one. But, Dog discovers a new source; "Facebook".

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Back in Colorado, Dog's on the hunt for a runner with more than a decade's worth of trouble with the law. But the fugitive's friends and family are reluctant to help Dog bring him in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: After releasing the second part of his autobiography, Dog and his family traveled across America, and this very special episode offers an intimate portrait of both the public and private moments of that journey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is back in Colorado chasing a young man with a taste for trouble. He's fled to Texas but with his family's house on the line Dog is willing to try a risky strategy.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Today's hunt takes Dog far from the glittering hotels of Waikiki to the parts of Hawaii tourist rarely see, Oahu's ramshackle tent cities. The team searches for a woman who has lost almost everything, her home, her family and her spirit.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's good friend and fellow bondsman Chris is running out of time. He has only days to find his fugitive or risk losing his business. In his hunt, Dog confronts duplicitous tipsters, vicious attack dogs, and hostile neighbors.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: The bounty-hunter adventures of Duane "Dog" Chapman and his Posse are chronicled in this one hour "Best Of" special, featuring superlative memorable moments from the previous seven seasons.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog launches a high stake hunt through the desolate and dangerous mountain landscape of western Colorado in pursuit of a gun-loving survivalist with a million dollar bond on his head. Will Dog's plan of using brains over brawn work?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Once in Montrose, Dog discovers that the million dollar fugitive is not the young bondsman's only problem. Dog and Beth make it their mission to both clean up the mess and teach him the fundamentals of bondsmanship.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: An old friend of Peter heads down to the practice with a sheep who had one lamb last night, but is struggling to give birth to her second. Although neither vet nor farmer are feeling optimistic for the unborn lamb's chances.

programme.title: Pet Heroes

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants are harnessed and locked into a computer ratchet system. Couples will make their way through junkyard obstacles, retrieving hubcaps. The male contestants will be standing on top of a bus while their female partners are strapped under the bus.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants are strapped to a line on the deck, with their bungees attached to a helicopter. Contestants will cut their way through two separate ropes. Contestants are connected to a helicopter and must repel down.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: The contestant will fire a starter's pistol and run from an attack dog. The contestants will lie in a pit made up of faux rocks and burlap. A 6 and a half inch wide beam is suspended over 100 feet in the air.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: The contestant stands on top of a moving semi truck jump and leaps. Approximately 300,000 superworms will be placed into the case with the contestants. Each contestant will be holding a paint ball gun and harnessed to a reverse bungee line.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Each contestant will be asked to eat two boiled buffalo testicles in 4 minutes. Each contestant will be harnessed and raised by crane. Each contestant will sit in the front seat of a car as the car is lowered by crane to the same depth of water.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Each contestant will be dragged behind a horse. Contestant will enter a elevator shaft and will be covered by approximately 400 rats. One at a time each contestant will sit in the front seat of a car as the car is raised by crane over 100 feet in the air.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Each contestant will climb a one hundred and ten foot tower. Each contestant will be asked to eat 6 worms in 4 minutes. Each contestant will have to find their way through an underground tunnel.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant will swim under the boat collecting glow sticks along the way. Contestant will throw a dart and the score that they hit, the number of crickets the they will have to eat. Contestant will be harnessed and raised by a crane.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Each contestant will climb a 35 foot power pole, they must stand on top. Contestant will select a fortune cookie, each fortune is inscribed with a different pig part. The contestant stands on a skid at the back of a semi-truck.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant will pull themselves into the belly of the helicopter. The number of pins left standing represents the number of live beetles that each contestant will have to eat. The contestant has to climb on a rope that is over a hundred feet in the air.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Clip show of the greatest moments from Season 1

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant walks the wing of a bi-plane in flight. We fill a plexiglass basin with water, plums, ribbon and garter snakes, and one big albino snake. To jump a car off a two level parking structure with the furthest distance.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants must ride a bull for eight seconds. Each contestant eats poached cow's brain, served cold. To go the furthest distance after being ratcheted up and rope swinging down.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: To jump from one moving boat to another. Climb into fishing boat tank filled with dead squid and retrieve weights from the bottom. Contestants shimmy out on a flag pole that is approximately 20 feet from the building, free the flag and shimmy back.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Mark Fair left for work and his fiancée, Karla Brown, stayed home. Later, he found her dead. During the autopsy, bite marks on her body were re-examined and forensic odontology identified the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1984, a passerby finds the torso of a woman in a cardboard box. A forensic entomologist analyzes nearby insect activity to determine when the victim was killed.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Residents of Noel, Missouri were stunned to learn that their bank had been robbed and the bank president was missing. His body was later found floating in a lake, securely bound to a chair with duct tape.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1996, Derrick Duehren returned to find his Oregon home burned to the ground. His wife's charred remains were later found in the rubble. Investigators set out to determine if it was an unfortunate accident or murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The prime suspect had a criminal record and his driver's license was found at the scene of a brutal double homicide.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Faced with three homicides that appear to be professional executions, investigators on both sides of the Atlantic must find a common thread between the victims.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1990, Shirley Andronowich's body was found mutilated. Eyewitnesses told police she had a fight with her husband the night before, but forensic evidence proved that he had nothing to do with her death.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A highway patrolman was dispatched to what he thought would be a routine traffic accident — until he looked in the car. He had seen hundreds of accidents, but none with as much blood as this.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An aspiring model turned up dead and the prime suspect was her boyfriend. When he was eventually cleared, investigators had to dig deeper to find the perpetrator. With the help of a forensic geologist, they identified the most unlikely suspects.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman who was known to have suffered from depression apparently took her own life. But her sister told police that, a year before her death, she said if anything were to happen to her there would be a note in the china cabinet.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Authorities track a kidnapper who let his victim write a last will and informed the family of her murder. A phone number written on a previous page left a lasting impression, which helped to convict.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A teenager went missing after an evening of horseback riding. Her body was found a month later, three miles from her home. But the killer unknowingly left trace evidence behind.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The investigation into the kidnapping and rape of an 18-year-old Ohio woman is aided when the victim returns hours after the incident occurred. With her help, the police are able to track the assailant to his front door.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: One warm summer afternoon, the town of Verona, Wisconsin faced its first triple homicide. To solve the case, investigators had to delve into the world of high rollers and offshore betting.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Doctors are puzzled when a two-year-old boy is rushed to the hospital with brain seizures and breathing difficulties. Finally, the boy's sister provides an important clue, raising the possibility of a rare syndrome.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Lives changed in the 20 years following an unsolved murder, and so did forensic science. In time, a high-powered microscope and DNA profiling revealed a clue no one had seen before.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2000, Christina Sanoubane was murdered in her Cedar Rapids apartment after moving away from her abusive boyfriend. There are clues at the scene: bloody footprints and DNA from the victim's rape kit.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a wealthy real estate tycoon goes missing, it appears to be foul play. In his will, he leaves instructions in case he should die under violent circumstances — which were carried out after a hiker comes across his bullet-ridden skull.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Edward Post drew a bath for his wife before going for a run. He returned to find her not breathing. She died before emergency response arrived. Police considered her death accidental until a motive surfaced.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A 29-year-old woman is killed instantly when a bomb explodes in her home. The device is so powerful that it embedded shrapnel in houses across the street. The bomber had not only knowledge and skill, but also a motive for murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The murders of an elderly couple leave police stumped until, two years later, they receive a major break. A jeweler looking through old newspaper clippings recognizes a necklace the female victim wore as having been pawned in her own shop.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Digital enhancement of security camera footage shows that what appears to be a casual encounter is actually a forced abduction. When investigators suspect the crimes are not random, they fear a serial killer may be on the loose.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1981, 6-year-old Cassie Hansen disappeared from her Minnesota church during an evening service. After receiving a tip that an older man was seen carrying a small person, police found Cassie's body in a dumpster.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: On Halloween night 2004, Adriane Insogna and Leslie Mazzara were brutally murdered in their Napa, California home.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1995, San Diego police are baffled by a pair of hands found in a dumpster. Through further investigation, they determine that the hands are those of missing person Don Hardin.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Young Navajos in the Southwest were dying at an alarming rate. The tribe's medicine men provided investigators with a critical clue that would lead halfway around the world to a most unlikely killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A lifelong resident of the tiny town of Lefroy, Tasmania was murdered outside his own home. Robbery appeared to be the motive, but with no suspects, the investigation came to a halt.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Mystic Force

programme.title: Power Rangers: Mystic Force

programme.title: Power Rangers: Mystic Force
programme.desc: Fly Trap has been destroyed, but Vida is still a vampire. The Rangers find out that Necrolai is the vampire who bit Vida. Chip is determined to save her from being a vampire.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Mystic Force
programme.desc: Xander has a big zit. He thinks he can get rid of it by using a perfection potion. Instead Xander starts turning into a tree. Vida has to help Xander and then the Rangers have to protect and figure out the secret of the Fire Heart.

programme.desc: Clare takes on the legacy of her mother as the Gatekeeper. Koragg captures Udonna. Necrolai is about to destroy the Rangers. Clare steps forward and the forces of evil use her to raise the gate.

programme.desc: The gates have been raised and Morticon is set free. Nick goes to save Clare while the others hold off Morticon. Clare uses the rest of her powers to lower the gates. The Rangers destroy Morticon with the help of the White Ranger.

programme.desc: Necrolai gets the Rangers to break the force field of a magical cave. Inside the cave is a magical lamp and a petrified mummy. Jenji is found inside the lamp. Imperious is brought to life by Octomus.

programme.desc: Imperious turns into Calindor and tries to persuade Udonna into believing he can help the Mystic Force. The Rangers are busy trying to fight Jester.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Mystic Force

programme.title: Power Rangers: Mystic Force

programme.title: Power Rangers: Mystic Force

programme.title: Power Rangers: Mystic Force
programme.desc: The Tribunal of Magic has turned down the teens' request to restore things back to the way they were.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Mystic Force

programme.desc: Leanbow is stopping the Master from rising and Sculpin has a plan to stop him. The Snow Prince commands that instead of being a teacher, Daggeron should take a lesson from Nick on following his gut.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Mystic Force
programme.desc: Hekatoid has captured Udonna and the Rangers chase after him in his own dimension in order to rescue Nick's mom. Daggeron is in the real world trying to stop all the tadpoles Hekatoid has lain to destroy the world.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Mystic Force
programme.desc: The teens lose their power trying to save Udonna.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Mystic Force
programme.desc: Matoombo is chosen to bring forth the Master. But Matoombo doesn't want to hurt anyone. Vida teams up with him to try to seal the Master away forever.

programme.desc: Itassis doesn't want to fight for the Master anymore and defies his wishes. The Master takes matters into his own hands and destroys Mystic Mother. The end of all good magic may be near.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día diez - Parte 1

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El tiránico Chef Gordon Ramsay regresa por tercer verano para enseñar y torturar a posibles Chefs. El ganador recibirá un trabajo de Chef en el resort Green Valley Ranch de Nevada.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los dos equipos se enfrentan en un desafío de preparación de alimentos que recompensa a los ganadores por la oportunidad de pasar tiempo con el Chef Ramsay fuera de la cocina.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El Chef Ramsay ordena a los concursantes restantes que preparen el desayuno para los miembros del servicio visitantes. El equipo ganador tendrá tiempo libre y los perdedores tendrán el rol de patrullar la cocina.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: En el cuarto día, los Chefs restantes compiten en una prueba de degustación con los ojos vendados. Los perdedores deben aceptar un castigo difícil mientras los ganadores cenan con el Chef Ramsay.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Para avanzar en este desafío, los siete Chefs restantes deben comprar y preparar la comida para la recepción de una boda.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Melissa se une a los hombres en una competencia para ver qué equipo puede preparar los mejores platos de langosta. Pero hay un problema: los equipos deben matar primero a sus crustáceos.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los seis concursantes restantes deben preparar aperitivos y platos principales con las sobras, por lo que ambos equipos deben crear sus propios menús de cena.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El Chef Ramsay consolida a los cinco concursantes restantes en un equipo, pero primero deben competir entre sí para impresionar a 100 estudiantes de secundaria.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los tres Chefs restantes preparan versiones gourmet de platos estadounidenses clásicos para jueces externos: sus madres, que no saben qué platos están probando.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: En el final de temporada, los ánimos se enfurecen cuando los dos concursantes preparan un último servicio de cena para el chef Ramsay.

programme.desc: El primer desafío de la temporada encuentra a los concursantes cortando a un rodaballo en finos filetes de 180 gramos. Un miembro de cada equipo debe actuar como camarero durante el servicio de comidas.

programme.desc: The Ricardos and Mertzes are leaving Genoa for Nice when Lucy decides they should all go by bicycle because they can't see enough of the countries from the train. Ricky and the Mertzes agree under protest and after an exhausting day of pedaling.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ricky is working in Monte Carlo, but Fred goofed and bargained for too little money for the engagement. Lucy and Ethel go to the casino to watch, but when Lucy finds a chip that someone dropped and replaces it on the table, it wins and continues to do so.

programme.title: I Love Lucy

programme.title: I Love Lucy

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Although they both agree not to try and influence Little Ricky's future, Lucy buys a toy doctor kit and Ricky gives him a drum set. Their son takes to the drums and begins to play it non-stop for days.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Orson Welles is scheduled to perform for a benefit in Ricky's club. Ricky is worried that Lucy will foul things up if she is around so he decides to send her off to Florida.

programme.title: I Love Lucy

programme.desc: Ricky insults Lucy's taste in hats so, as a joke, Lucy puts a loving cap trophy on her head that Ricky plans to present to champion jockey Johnny Longden at a National Turf Association dinner later that night. The trophy gets stuck on Lucy's head.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: When the Ninja interrupt Lord Garmadon from using his Mega-Weapon to ‘turn back the clock’ and bring to life the fossils of a monster, the Ninja are accidentally hit and turned into kids.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: The ninja face off with an exhibit of a Stone Samurai Warrior that the toxic venom from the Great Devourer has brought to life while Garmadon manages to find a fabled Dark Island that is said to hold dark powers.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: The Ninjas, Lloyd, Sensei Wu and Misako journey to the Dark Island to find a ‘Temple of Light’ that can restore the Ninjas’ elemental powers but are attacked by Starteeth (barnacle-like star fish) that start eating through their ship.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: After battling off Garmadon’s Stone Army, the Ninjas finally arrive at the Temple of Light where they harness their pure elemental powers, concentrating them onto Lloyd who becomes more powerful than he ever imagined.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: When the Ninjas’ attempt to return Garmadon’s ‘Helmet of Darkness’ to its perch at the Celestial Clock in order to prevent the final battle between Lloyd and his father from beginning fails, a Super Weapon is created that can destroy all of Ninjago.

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Una aparición religiosa se manifiesta en el baño del departamento y poco tardan el noruego y el abuelo en encontrarle una ventaja a esta situación.

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio
