programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #14 Episode 0: The First Contact
programme.desc: The stickup that started it all! Lupin and Fujiko are both after an ancient artifact Jigen is supposed to protect, while Goemon happens to be searching for his clan's lost treasure nearby. Of course, Inspector Zenigata isn't far behind.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #15: Operation: Return the Treasure
programme.desc: Lupin sets his sights on the legendary Trick Diamond, stolen by his late rival Mark Williams. Instead of finding the diamond, Fujiko relays Mark's dying challenge: return all the other treasures he stole to reveal the location of the gem.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #16: Swallowtail Tatoo
programme.desc: A mysterious criminal captures Lupin and Fujiko with a very specific order: in order to save Fujiko's life, Lupin must infiltrate a high-security museum and steal the Bull's Eye jewel. One little problem: the jewel is cursed to kill anyone who steals it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's new target is the digital currency gained from the transactions made on this site. Lupin sneaks into a massive high-security server facility, known as the "twin towers". Lupin greets the guard to the key, a young girl and skilled hacker "Ami".

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Hunt down the greatest thief of our times, Lupin III!" The Marco Polo executives have set a trap in the form of the Lupin Game. This has people all over the world tracking down Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shinpei Mayama, the Rat Clan, Union Mama... the all-stars of assassination, from all over the world, suddenly come after Lupin. They're players in a new game started by the executives of Marco Polo: Happy Deathday.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko smiles deviously as she points her gun at Lupin, when Zenigata arrives to save him and Ami. They get into the inspector's car which takes off, but it's soon attacked by soldiers who are trying to cash in the price on Lupin's head.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is shot in the head by a drone fighter. With the death of its target, the Lupin Game is concluded. Time passes, and people forget about the game. Released from his duty of hunting Lupin, Ami now lives with Zenigata, when one day Goemon visits her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: The "Smart Safe" has come to the Greater Tokyo Bank. Lupin is goaded by Fujiko and Jigen to try and crack the technological wonder. What can he do against this peculiarly secure safe?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is hired by Gaston to retrieve a painting, and manages to do so easily enough... except the painting has a strange resemblance to a real Picasso piece, forcing Lupin to examine the truth behind why he was hired.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin visits Gaston's grave. There he meets the elderly Camille, with who he goes out for a drink when the pub's phone begins to ring. On the other end of the line is the supposedly dead Gaston.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is shot, and Albert gets his hands on the notebook. Lupin is saved by Jigen and Goemon and manages to survive his injuries under care. He then explains his past with Albert and how they know each other.

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands: Meowth Rules!

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands: Tracey Gets Bugged

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands: A Way Off Day Off

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands: Wherefore Art Thou, Pokémon?

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands: Git Along, Little Pokémon

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands: The Mystery Menace

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands: Misty Meets Her Match

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands: Bound For Trouble

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands: The Pokémon Water War

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands: Pokémon Food Fight

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands: Pokémon Double Trouble

programme.title: La traición

programme.title: La patrona

programme.title: La patrona

programme.title: La patrona

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia, in order to be part of the National Beautification Program, decides to become a home decorator and offers her services to the neighbors. Next door neighbor, and insurance agent, Joe Digby hires Morticia in hopes of selling them insurance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia taunts Uncle Fester into announcing that he is going to join the Peace Corps. Fester feels he's a cinch to be accepted because Gomez plans to pull strings in Washington on his behalf. The entire family agrees to help him study for the exam.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Allyn Joslyn guest-stars as Sam Hilliard, a former truant officer who now heads a private school where Wednesday and Pugsley are enrolled. When Hilliard breaks under the strain of dealing with the Addams children, Gomez buys the school.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Dr. Marvin P. Gunderson is summoned to examine Kitty Kat, the ailing lion pet of the Addams Family. Morticia decides that it is the doctor who needs help. To build his confidence, human members of the family pretend to be ill so he can effect cures.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's concern that Lurch is overworked leads Gomez to the operating table to assemble a custom-built secondary butler. Lurch lets the robot do all the work and then begins to feel that he isn't needed anymore.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Uncle Fester incinerates the family's stuffed bear with his flamethrower, Morticia reports the accident to the insurance company. Mr. Henson the head of the company, sends his assistant, Mr. Digby, to handle the case.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch suffers from unrequited love over Tiny Trivia (guest star Diane Jergens), Morticia's visiting school chum who only has eyes for show business. The entire family decides to try to turn their stolid butler into a new personality.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Ophelia laments that she has been jilted, Morticia suggests a career as an alternative to marriage. She tries chemistry first (with explosive results) then turns to operatic singing. Cousin Itt is summoned to coach her to stardom.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez decide to keep Wednesday and Pugsley home from school after Morticia sees the fairy tales they have to read. When the truant officer comes to investigate, he is shocked at what he finds.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia calls a psychiatrist after she fears Pugsley is becoming normal after he abandons his pet octopus for a puppy and is seen wearing a Boy Scout uniform, playing with a baseball bat, and helping an old lady cross the street.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester, who has become lonely, convinces Gomez and Morticia that it is time for him to find a bride. He decides to put an ad in the newspaper, looking for love. But things go awry when a door-to-door saleswoman comes by.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Election fever grips the Addams household, as Gomez (John Astin) supports the council candidate whose campaign promise is to drain the town's disgusting bogs. Morticia (Carolyn Jones), who likes "the lovely bogs," labels the candidate an extremist.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley and Wednesday start a row at a party when their gift of a tarantula upsets Harold, the birthday boy. Harold's parents insist that the Addams children lack breeding and, therefore, are no longer allowed to play with their son.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Pugsley befriends Gorgo, a circus gorilla, Gorgo decides to follow Pugsley and Gomez home, where is accepted as one of the family. But Gorgo gives Morticia's tea guests, the Ladies League members, quite a shock.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A pair of bank robbers are welcomed as Halloween trick-or-treaters by Morticia and Gomez. The creepy atmosphere of the house, Morticia's smoldering holiday punch, and Lurch's ominous presence impel the crooks to abandon their plans.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Lionel Barker, a former suitor of Morticia's, shows up, Gomez is jealous. But he's soon calmed when he learns that Barker is after Mildred, the new maid. The Addamses then discover that Barker is a con man--after Mildred's money, not her love.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Newlyweds move in next door. But the honeymoon loses its tranquility when Uncle Fester enters their house through a tunnel and they flee in terror at the sight of Lurch, Grandmama sharpening her ax, and Morticia and Gomez bathing the octopus.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family faces a crisis when Wednesday packs her spider and runs away (after being scolded for playing with Uncle Fester's TNT). When they try to file a missing person report, a detective is anxious to retire early due to their story.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Official visitors from an unfriendly nation receive the shock of their lives when they decide to exploit the Addams Family as an average uncultured family. The visitors are shaken up by Morticia's carnivorous plants among other things.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's cousin, Melancholia, wants to marry Clarence P. Harvey after most of her marital prospects have joined the Foreign Legion. Clarence recoils when Melancholia puts on a campaign to win him, backed by Morticia, Gomez and Clarence's boss.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes a veritable gazelle when he takes dancing lessons at Gomez and Morticia's suggestion after he admits to being a wallflower at social functions. Each member of the Addams Family teaches Lurch a different step.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama's paintings leave an art critic speechless, so Gomez sends for his friend, Sam Picasso, to teach Grandmama to paint in the abstract. The starving artist ignores Grandmama's and Morticia's work as he eats and paints.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Rockland Cartright III is a beatnik who crashes his motorbike into a tree and recuperates at the Addams house. Each regards the other as an oddity, although the family learns to appreciate certain aspects of Rockland's life.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Mr. Briggs, the postman, is hired by the government to do undercover work in the Addams house. While pretending to be a stamp collector, he investigates rumors that coded radio messages are being sent from the house.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch's tiny fire-eating mother visits and demands that Lurch's employers wait on her boy hand-and-foot after Lurch leads her to believe that it's his house. Lurch revels in the unexpected attention he gets from Morticia and Gomez.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's electrical output fails abruptly. Should they call a doctor or an electrician to bring Fester back? Morticia prescribes a bowl of porcupine mold, and both she and Gomez agree that long exposure to moon rays would be beneficial.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family would like to vacation on the moon, but the billion-dollar travel cost is slightly prohibitive. Uncle Fester volunteers $21.13 and Morticia, using Gomez's new supercomputer, suggests placing a $2,000 bet on the daily double horse race.

programme.desc: Aggressive carnivores sometimes seem like the bad guys of the animal kingdom, but top predators play an essential role: keeping nature in balance. Today, Jungle Jack is counting down nature’s supreme hunters, like lions, crocs, leopards and hyenas!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack brings us bouncing baby animals from around the world. Some are cute, some are cuddly, and some bring us hope for the next generation of wildlife.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Wild Hair
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack for six warm and fuzzy tales about animals sporting funky fur! Musk ox, giraffe, tapir, bison, cheetah and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he joins some very fortunate creatures on their journeys back to the wild, like Koalas, Big Horn Sheep, Alligators, Grizzly Bears, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack explores tributaries off the Panama Canal in search of wildlife like Capuchin Monkeys, Geoffroy's Tamarins, Spectacled Caimans, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Ebb and Flow
programme.desc: Being an animal is thirsty work! Learn how water impacts the lives of elephants, hippos, caiman, giraffes and more! Six stories about the water supply in diverse ecosystems around the planet.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Jack of All Trades
programme.desc: Caring for animals can be a big job! Join Jack for some on-the-job-training as he explores six incredible, dangerous and dirty animal jobs, like wrangling crocodiles, caring for elephants, herding cattle and a whole lot more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack as he counts down some of the mightiest mouths in the animal kingdom, including Great White Sharks, Hyenas, Lions, Hippos, Nile Crocodiles, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Jack's Scariest Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack for a heart-pounding adventure with lions, crocs, king cobras, sea snakes, bats and Tasmanian devils!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Creatures of the Night
programme.desc: Prepare for a fright as Wild Countdown is venturing into the night! Stealthy hunters equipped with night vision, giants so powerful they could crush you with a single step, plus bats, rats and deadly vipers!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along for a biting and stinging countdown filled with some of the world’s most venomous creatures. Komodo Dragons, Diamondback Rattlesnakes, Jellyfish, Scorpions, and Stingrays!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he witnesses a special delivery first-hand and meets some other precious animal babies, like camels, manatees, rhino and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack is headed to Alberta, Canada for a day at the Discovery Wildlife Park. He and Sue meet a couple who have dedicated their lives to helping some of Canada's wildlife survive against the odds, like orphaned porcupines, beavers, and bears.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Jungle Jack is back at the barnyard with six of his favorite farm animal friends, like pot-bellied pigs, horses, cows, and even camels!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: It's all Relative
programme.desc: Prepare to be shocked and amazed, because today Jack is exploring the family trees of six wild animals! Believe it or not rlephants are related to manatees, the same is true for rhinos and tapirs, giraffe and okapi and more surprising animal relatives.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Get a glimpse of Jack in his own backyard on this trip to Bigfork, Montana. And, Jack and Sue visit Triple D Game Ranch to get an up-close look at bears, wolves, and even an elusive cougar.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Living Fossils
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he meets some of the most ancient species living on Earth. Red pandas, hoatzins, koalas, crocodiles and pelicans!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: In the wild, animals use their noses to find food, water and even mates! Today, Jungle Jack counts down the animal kingdom’s superior sniffers - from grizzly bears and sharks, to dogs and rhinos – find out which notable nose is the most powerful!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: Jack and his daughter Kathaleen travel to a remote island in the Canadian Province of British Columbia to catch sight of the rare “Spirit Bear,” an all-white Black Bear. Kathaleen also takes a behind the scenes tour of a floating lodge.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Jungle Jack takes off on a very special egg hunt, looking for creatures big and small that hatch from eggs! Crocodiles, bald eagles, sea turtles, ostriches, penguins, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he heads to Pigeon Forge, Tennessee for an All-American Bald Eagle adventure with the American Eagle Foundation at Dollywood!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Get a glimpse of life on the Hanna's farm. Then he and Sue meet a couple that have dedicated their lives to providing a home for disabled dogs, cats, and horses. Jack heads to the eastern front of the Rocky Mountains for an old-fashioned cattle drive!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Zootastic Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jack for a globetrotting adventure as he counts down seven zoo-tastic adventures from the Australia Zoo to his home base, the Columbus Zoo! See which zoo is number one on this Wild Countdown!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack for a weird and wonderful countdown celebrating some of the most unique animals on Earth. Pink River Dolphins, Emus, Sichuan Takin, Okapi, Gerenuk, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: Jack and his daughter Kathleen travel to Winnipeg to experience the animals of Canada. At Oak Hammock Marsh, Jack visits a restored natural habitat that functions as a major stop for migratory birds.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack and Suzi are stunned to see the Great Migration in action as animals cross the Mara River into Tanzania's Serengeti National Park.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack travels to a special animal rescue center in the jungles of Costa Rica, and encounters creatures around every corner. Caiman, Toucan, Iguanas, Howler Monkeys and more!

programme.title: Jamie Cooks Italy
programme.desc: Jamie learns from the people of the Aeolian Islands about cooking stuffed squid and creates a lunch for one of the island archipelago's largest families.

programme.title: Jamie: Keep Cooking and Carry On
programme.desc: Jamie shows how to make a vegetarian chilli and pasta with three easy sauces, homemade tagliatelle, a cheat's carbonara, and a simple tomato sauce.

programme.title: Jamie: Keep Cooking and Carry On

programme.desc: Moroccan bream; couscous salad; pomegranate and harissa; British burgers; shred salad; pickles and things.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When a theft is committed, something valuable is stolen. But when a criminal needs a new identity, theft becomes a matter of life and death.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: No matter how chaotic or how clean a crime scene appears to be, the culprit is bound to leave something telling behind. Occasionally, it's nothing more than a fingerprint or shoe tread. Sometimes that's all that's needed.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The tiniest residue left at the scene can become a mark of distinction in the most singular and intimate of ways.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: George Orwell's concept of Big Brother remains in the realm of fiction. But as technology becomes more a part of our lives, it's becoming increasingly more difficult to make a move without leaving behind an electronic trace.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: To the astute detective and forensic specialist, the biggest clues often hide in plain sight, and what seems trivial to some is in reality Critical Evidence.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Drowning deaths often look like accidents and water can destroy the scant clues the killer may have left behind. Investigators must turn to forensic science to solve cases where the victim is found dead in the water.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In Northern California, a fire rages in the middle of the night. A woman's charred body is discovered in the smoldering aftermath.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Poison is an almost invisible form of death, and toxicologists must look for hidden clues in blood and tissue to bring these murders to light.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: For the forensic entomologist, the insects that nest in dead bodies are like tiny witnesses to a crime.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Arson fires are set for their own sake, or to cover a different crime, such as murder. Think fire consumes all vital clues? Think again. Arson investigators can glean important clues from scorched rubble and ignite the unquenchable flames of justice.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Identifying Burned Remains: It's difficult to have a murder investigation without a body, and burning up the victim is a time-honored method of destroying physical evidence.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Investigators rely on forensic odontology to identify a body from a single tooth and to catch two brutal killers from their bite marks.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Solving crimes may begin with gut intuition, but advanced science provides investigators with irrefutable proof. When criminals go to great lengths to mask their crimes, Investigators must step up the challenge and remain forever …undaunted.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In North Carolina, the home of a prominent couple becomes an unlikely scene of terrible bloodshed. Across the country, a California woman vanishes, worrying her family and the investigators trying to find her.

programme.desc: Part 2 of 2. Spike and Carlee are stranded on Cybertron, desperate to find the Cybertronium needed to heal the ailing Autobots on Earth. Their only hope is to free the Dinobots, who are on Cybertron under the control of Shockwave's brainwashing program.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: When Starscream inadvertently activates a time machine, he and his fellow Decepticons are sent back to medieval times. Luckily Spike, Hoist, and Warpath follow them back, and with help from Merlin, they are prepared to defend the kingdom from them.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Crash-landing on the moon Titan, the Decepticons trick the population into believing they are “Sky Gods” and that the people should serve them. Desperate to free her people, a brave girl sends an S.O.S. to the Autobots…but will they arrive in time?

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: To stop the Decepticons from drilling into Earth’s core, the Autobots hijack and reprogram the mighty Devastator to use against them. But when they lose control of the giant, the only hope for survival is for the Autobots and Decepticons to work together!

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: To stop the Decepticons from drilling into Earth's core, the Autobots hijack and reprogram the mighty Devastator to use against them. But when they lose control of the giant, the only hope for survival is for the Autobots and Decepticons to work together!

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Autobot Tracks is damaged while trying to help authorities investigate a plague of car thefts in New York City. Once he is repaired by his human friend Raoul, the two uncover a Decepticon plan to turn the cars into an unstoppable Decepticon army!

programme.title: Transformers: Beast Machines
programme.desc: The Maximals discover a new Beast Mode Maximal – a bat named Nightscream – and a mysterious fruit tree, neither of which should exist on the machine world of Cybertron.

programme.title: Transformers: Beast Machines
programme.desc: Rattrap finally learns how to Transform, only to discover his Robot Mode has no weapons. With nowhere else to turn for protection, he strikes a deal with Megatron.

programme.title: Transformers: Beast Machines
programme.desc: The Maximals discover a junkyard facility where the robot shells of the missing Transformers are stored. Meanwhile, Blackarachnia is utterly convinced that Thrust's spark is Silverbolt's.

programme.title: Transformers: Beast Machines
programme.desc: Cheetor leads a dangerous mission to try to bring out Tankor's old Maximal personality. In doing so, Rattrap discovers a major clue to the Maximal's missing memories and discovers that Tankor has Rhinox's spark. Jetstorm removes Blackarachnia's spark.

programme.title: Transformers: Beast Machines
programme.desc: Nightscream fights to retrieve Blackarachnia's stolen Spark. Meanwhile, Optimus is able to contact Rhinox's Spark, but Rhinox deals him a major surprise.

programme.title: Transformers: Beast Machines
programme.desc: Megatron sends his Generals and Diagnostic Drone into the catacombs to kidnap Nightscream and learn the secret behind his Beast Mode. Nightscream is forced to relive a painful memory from his past.

programme.title: Transformers: Beast Machines
programme.desc: Tankor uncovers an ancient weapon with the power to turn organic material into cybernetic metal. Nightscream gets hit by the weapon and the Maximals race against time to save him from going off-line.

programme.title: Transformers: Beast Machines
programme.desc: Rattrap uncovers a catalyst program that speeds up the growth of Cybertron's newfound plant life. Meanwhile, Blackarachnia discovers that Thrust's spark is actually Waspinator's and that Jetstorm's spark is Silverbolt's.

programme.title: Transformers: Beast Machines
programme.desc: Megatron prepares a doomsday weapon that can wipe out everything organic on Cybertron – including the Maximals. Meanwhile, Optimus discovers his own doomsday weapon...

programme.title: Transformers: Beast Machines
programme.desc: Optimus destroys Cybertron and realises that the oracle sent them to Earth to bring back organic life, for there to be a balance between technology and organic.

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise
programme.desc: Windblade's concern for Optimus' wellbeing may spell doom for the entire Away Team when they run up against a sly hunter of a Decepticon named RAZORPAW.

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise
programme.desc: Grimlock forgets how to fight when, in an effort to become smarter, he downloads a huge amount of data into his brain and overwrites his combat instincts.

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise
programme.desc: After being coaxed into going to a concert given by his favorite band, Bumblebee hopes for a quiet evening away from the Scrapyard, but finds action and danger when BISK attacks the arena.

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Top Tier has been dominating in the ring, but now they face the joint forces of Lil J-Boogie, Stephy Slays, and Ariel Sky who want to make them pay for their underhanded ways. In the Main Event, Tormenta faces former WOW Champion Penelope Pink.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Classmaster and a surprise partner, announced by Samantha Smart, take on the Fierce Sisters. Chantilly Chella and Holidead face off with Las Bandidas. In the Main Event, Lana Star challenges the culprits who ran up her hotel bill.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Classmaster attempts to put Santana Garrett into detention as they battle in the ring. Also in action is Reina Del Rey, Sandy Shore, Holidead, Genesis and Katarina Jinx. The action heats up and still, so many questions surround WOW.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Tessa Blanchard invades WOW - Women Of Wrestling demanding a Championship Title Match. Champion Santana Garrett lets Tessa know she better get in line.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: With her father physically assaulted by Tessa Blanchard, Santana Garrett vows that the Championship is now second to her personal issues with The Born Legend.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: The Beast demands her shot at the WOW World Championship. Current Champion Santana Garrett’s eyes remain locked on revenge against Tessa Blanchard. And Tessa provides an exclusive interview that explains her reasons for attacking Santana’s father.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Champion Santana Garrett wants revenge on Tessa Blanchard for what she did to her beloved father. Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard gets what she wants… a shot at the Championship.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Psycho Sister Razor has her debut match against Faith The Lioness. Plus, following the unprecedented Triple Threat Match, the most prestigious prize in women’s wrestling, the WOW World Championship Title, is decided tonight!

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: The Norwegian Nightmare, Nikki Krampus makes her long-awaited debut. Beaten in a back alley, Keta Rush seeks revenge against her assailant The Dagger. But Keta soon finds that to succeed she will have to fight off the more than just The Dagger.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: A new Champion in WOW is coming to terms with the fact the bullseye of her competitors is now squarely focused on her. Havok, The Monster Of Madness emerges as a threat to the WOW roster.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Dedicated to her ambition of never quitting, Stephy Slays demonstrates perseverance in an extraordinary match against The Disciplinarian. The smart ending will be unforgettable. Meanwhile, Tessa Blanchard takes her biggest risk since joining WOW.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: The Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard is the new WOW World Champion, and The Beast, Jungle Grrrl, and Havok The Monster Of Madness have lined up to challenge the Champion. A Triple Threat Number One Contender Match will decide who will wrestle Tessa Blanchard.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Tessa Blanchard seemingly conspires with World’s Greatest Attorney, Sophia Lopez to handpick her Championship opponent ...WOW’s newest competitor, Mexico’s high flying Luchadora Serpentine.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Foes Jungle Grrrl and The Beast are forced to put aside their differences to battle The Monsters of Madness, Havok, and Hazard. Can the two animals of the ring coexist long enough to secure victory? The Tag Team Championship Series continues.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: While pursuing Carl Martin, Josh stops at a marshal's office where Carl is being held.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: When phony wanted posters put a price on the head of a retired Confederate officer, Colonel Sykes' daughter summons Josh Randall to help keep the bounty hunters at bay.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A reclusive old man with an Apache bodyguard is wanted for a crime committed long ago.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A ranch manager hires Randall to bring back a line rider charged with grand theft.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall is rooked into advancing half the bounty to a man who promises to lead him to the wanted criminal Shawnee Bill, but Bill may be closer than Randall thinks.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A banker with a consuming thirst for vengeance hires Randall to accompany him to track down the man he believes responsible for his son's death and a bank robbery.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall is deputized to transport a ruthless killer to Tucson but exchanges him for the nun kidnapped by the killer's gang.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall brings a suspected murderer to Pot Hole but fears the man won't receive a fair trial when he finds the townspeople in the grip of a power-mad bully.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: When Josh, as a favor to a friend, escorts a beautiful woman to a trial that could see her hang for killing her husband, her lover, and a foreman, she charms him to convince her of her innocenences.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is asked by Stacy Torrance for help when she finds a wanted poster under her door - for her for murder.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Owing a favor to a sheriff, Josh agrees against better judgment to go to the lawless town of Bent Horn to bring back a man wanted for bank robbery and murder.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh sets out to help a heartbroken wife locate her missing husband, but his mission of mercy meets with a resistant and tight-lipped townspeople.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is bushwhacked by bounty hunters in cahoots with the local sheriff, who now must keep Josh from blowing the whistle on their illegal but lucrative \\"bounty game\\".

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A sadistic pair of killers escape from prison who have no qualms about killing.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Following an Indian attack on their stagecoach that kills his prisoner, Randall and an eastern gentleman unaccustomed to the ways of the West must trek to safety across many long, hot miles of hostile Apache territory.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: On Christmas, Eve Randall receives his most daunting assignment yet from a young boy who has eight cents to pay: bring in Santa Claus.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Thieves are lying in wait to ambush mail carriers and eventually Josh is hired to help ensure that the mail will get through.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is knocked out by a posse who wants his prisoner who is wanted for killing his step-daughter.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh needs to get his wounded prisoner to Bannach in three days to prevent an innocent man from hanging.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh rides into a small town looking for Vic Warsaw but is told by the Sheriff that Warsaw was buried that day and killed by Miss Lucy Fremont the night before.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Four men break out of prison looking for revenge against Aben Starr who turned them in after their first escape attempt.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is resting in Benson when two bounty hunters bring in a man - the mayor - dead.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A grieving father who is the town drunk hires Josh Randall with his last $30 to find his murdered son's body, but Josh's search for clues runs up against a cowardly conspiracy of silence.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: At the request of his friend's wife, Randall comes to assist and protect a war buddy in his bid for the town's mayoralty, quickly running afoul of the established political machine and its corrupt mayor and wanted sheriff.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A bounty hunter is not a hero in his own hometown, as Josh learns when he honors a dying friend's request to return his body to Cameron and the townspeople rush to judgment, believing Josh killed him for the reward money.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is approached by the wife of a wanted man eager to turn himself in peacefully, provided Josh splits the bounty with his wife.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A man with unwavering faith in a legend about lost treasure hires Josh to lead his family on an expedition into the desert to locate the cache of Spanish gold.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi's life points, Yugi can't bring himself to attack his dear friend. Yugi summons Joey's favorite monster Red-Eyes Black Dragon to bring Joey back to his senses.

programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik's spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: It's the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals. But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City finals begin! The eight finalists have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the first duel of the Battle City finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring who possessed Bakura. Yugi quickly disposes of Bakura's grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns. If that's not bad enough, Bakura's Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi's Life Points every time Yugi attacks. Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi's trapped.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster. Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals or will he surrender to save Bakura's life?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed. The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters… and the dangerous powers it released.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion's strategy.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion's Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Joey's monsters and his Life Points. Can Joey effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a feeding frenzy as Odion's Mystical Beast Selket devours Joey's monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution! How can Joey defeat Selket when it ingests Joey's monsters whenever they're summoned on to the field?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
